pages.text: If you have broken a crucible or used a soul extraction rune, you probably noticed a cloud of taint floating above the ground. While it fades eventually, it is important to be aware of its effects and properties. Standing in a cloud of taint will give you two potion effects: Poison and Wavering Soul

Wavering Soul is a special effect that will kill any creature that drops to half a heart of health while under its effects. Anything killed by Wavering Soul in this way will drop a Solidified Tear. When paired with the Poison this is a very dangerous combo.
